share_info.tips: #竞燃之夜阵容官宣#的相关内容，来智搜看看

response.msg:
嗯，用户想了解"竞燃之夜阵容官宣"的信息。看起来这是个即将在北京举办的大型文体跨界活动，结合了体育、电竞和娱乐元素。我需要从搜索结果中整理最新最准确的信息。

先看看时间信息。今天是2025年11月3日，而活动将在10天后举行，也就是11月13日。地点明确是国家游泳中心(水立方)。这个时间点很关键，因为有些搜索结果提到的是2024年的活动，比如结果5、9、27、29、31-35都是去年的信息，需要排除掉[^31-35]。

活动的核心特点是跨界联动，结合了竞技体育选手和娱乐明星。主要阵容包括：

体育方面有乒乓球选手孙颖莎、马龙、樊振东、王楚钦、陈梦；游泳跳水选手汪顺和龙道一；篮球运动员郭艾伦；围棋选手柯洁；还有极限运动员邵子恒。

娱乐明星方面有歌手任嘉伦、吉克隽逸、白举纲等。电竞选手也很抢眼，包括AG战队的司马光、一诺、钟意、长生，iG战队的GALA、Meiko、WEI，以及EDG的可能参与。

活动形式很多样，有单人舞台表演、合作舞台、脱口秀等。比如任嘉伦会有赛车手主题的表演，吉克隽逸唱《彩色的黑》，还有郭艾伦的脱口秀。节目单虽然已公布但官方提醒可能有变动。

购票方面是通过微博会员礼包分三档：初级280元(看台两侧)、中级380元(看台后排)、高级580元(看台前排+抽内场机会)。高级礼包有5%概率抽到内场升级。需要注意12岁以下不能入场，13-18岁需监护人同意。

直播信息还不确定，结果6提到2024年是微博和咪咕视频，但2025年官方还没宣布。安全方面强调"不应援、不聚集、不逗留"[^17-19]。

用户可能想了解活动的亮点和看点，我会突出跨界表演和明星阵容。在整理信息时需要区分清楚2024和2025年的活动，避免时间混淆。


以下是2025年微博竞燃之夜的核心信息整理，综合官方公告及可靠信源：
### **一、时间与地点**
- **时间**：2025年11月13日 17:30
- **地点**：北京国家游泳中心（水立方）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
微博竞燃之夜

### **二、官方阵容名单**
#### **竞技体育选手**
1. **乒乓球**：孙颖莎、王楚钦、马龙、樊振东、陈梦```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [4], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "88小兰花", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226817346602974", "index": 4, "label": ""}]}}```
2. **游泳/跳水**：汪顺、龙道一```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
3. **篮球/棋类**：郭艾伦（篮球）、柯洁（围棋）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 11, "data": {"num": [1, 30], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "郭艾伦", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228931667201710", "index": 30, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}], "name": "郭艾伦", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.6.0.500.500.50/6e0d397dly8fg4aav5momj20e80dw0sz.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762169647&ssig=A7xHMECusx", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228931667201710", "vType": 0}}```
4. **极限运动**：邵子恒（与龙道一合作舞台）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
88小兰花
郭艾伦

#### **艺人及表演嘉宾**
1. **歌手/演员**：
- 任嘉伦（赛车手主题单人舞台）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [16, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "球儿是YUAN的", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228931020230458", "index": 16, "label": ""}, {"name": "任家小朵拉R", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228926755931886", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
- 吉克隽逸（《彩色的黑》等曲目）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "少冰美式R", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902412714887", "index": 25, "label": ""}]}}```
- 白举纲（单人舞台）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
- 蒋敦豪（《种地吧》乐队主唱）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [12, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "种地吧蒋敦豪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228896796279752", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228489079784626", "index": 26, "label": ""}], "name": "种地吧蒋敦豪", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/a8297c31ly8h2djzmuulyj20sg0sgdhl.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762169647&ssig=7nAVa6JHGl", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228896796279752", "vType": 0}}```
2. **跨界合作**：
- 邵子恒×龙道一（极限运动×跳水）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
- 早安（说唱歌手×运动员联动）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "早安没吃饱", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228896821708077", "index": 19, "label": "大v"}], "name": "早安没吃饱", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/9c1d2d18ly8hmste8zq93j20e80e8aam.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762169647&ssig=kHPEhikOhp", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228896821708077", "vType": 0}}```
微博竞燃之夜
球儿是YUAN的

#### **电竞选手**
- **AG战队**：一诺、钟意、长生、司马光```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [1, 11, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "AG一诺ovo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228913770367384", "index": 11, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "AG长生-", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228911866418565", "index": 24, "label": ""}], "name": "AG一诺ovo", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006yMYrfly8i1sq0ks5qxj30u00u0781.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762169647&ssig=MtfKLLehBP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228913770367384", "vType": 0}}```
- **iG战队**：GALA、Meiko、WEI```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [13, 15, 18], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228917314554732", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "iG电子竞技俱乐部", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228911870609023", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "Meiko田野", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228911896039007", "index": 18, "label": ""}], "name": "召唤师Park", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.16.21.551.551.50/96542c59ly8geqtawegnej20gr0gq0to.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762169647&ssig=7%2FXkd8O76z", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228917314554732", "vType": 0}}```
- **其他**：EDG成员（存疑，需待官方确认）```风险提示```EDG参与信息源自2024年历史数据，2025年阵容未获最新可靠证实```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 25, "data": {"num": [13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "召唤师Park", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228917314554732", "index": 13, "label": ""}]}}```
Meiko田野

### **三、舞台亮点与节目单**
1. **表演形式**：
- 乐队演出、脱口秀（郭艾伦参与）、单人/合作舞台```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
- 融合电竞特效、体育器械元素（如赛车、乒乓装置）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [16, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "球儿是YUAN的", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228931020230458", "index": 16, "label": ""}, {"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228489079784626", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```
2. **高能节目**：
- 吉克隽逸《彩色的黑》升级版
- 任嘉伦压轴唱跳（节目单排序推测）```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 33, "data": {"num": [16], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "球儿是YUAN的", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228931020230458", "index": 16, "label": ""}]}}```
### **四、参与方式与票务**
1. **会员购票礼包**（11月3日-10日开放）：
| 礼包类型 | 价格 | 座位区域 | 额外权益 |
|----------|---------|-------------------|----------|
| 高级 | 580元 | 看台前排+5%内场升级 | 2年微博会员+装扮券 |
| 中级 | 380元 | 看台后排中区 | 1年会员 |
| 初级 | 280元 | 看台两侧 | 1年会员 |

```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 36, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
2. **注意事项**：
- 12岁以下禁止入场；13-18岁需监护人同意```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 38, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
- 实名购票，信息错误不退换```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 39, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
### **五、争议与风险提示**
1. **直播渠道存疑**：网传“微博+咪咕直播”为2024年合作方，2025年平台暂未官宣```风险提示```
2. **时间混淆**：周柯宇、无畏等提及的“2024中国力量竞燃之夜”已于去年举办，与本次活动无关```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 43, "data": {"num": [5, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "周柯宇", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5099116634574652", "index": 5, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5098510682952101", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "周柯宇", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/b036d7ffly8hdbrqjr6xqj20u00u0gne.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762169647&ssig=AUgpcNHNY4", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5099116634574652", "vType": 0}}```
周柯宇

### **六、安全倡议**
官方多次强调：**禁止线下应援、聚集**，需遵守《安全倡议》```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 45, "data": {"num": [11, 12, 14, 15], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "惠若琪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228912005091863", "index": 14, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "AG一诺ovo", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228913770367384", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "种地吧蒋敦豪", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228896796279752", "index": 12, "label": ""}, {"name": "iG电子竞技俱乐部", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228911870609023", "index": 15, "label": ""}], "name": "惠若琪", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/0023CBYAly8gozabkg1dkj60e80e8dg402.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762169647&ssig=qdJeeDSVJj", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228912005091863", "vType": 0}}```

---
**提示**：节目单及阵容以11月13日实际播出为准。建议关注```wbCustomBlock{"type": "midquoted", "index": "6505792952_1", "data": {"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "https://weibo.com/u/6505792952"}}```获取实时更新。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 46, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "微博竞燃之夜", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228902235508906", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
